sentences.sentence: The US and UK struck 36 Houthi targets in Yemen on Saturday, the second time they have hit back at Iran-backed groups in recent weeks.

sentences.sentence: Yemen's Houthi rebels released footage on Saturday showing military drills simulating the targeting of Israeli military positions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The Russian Defence Ministry released on Sunday footage of its air crews destroying two missiles in the South Donetsk region as part of its special military operation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: On Sunday, the Russian Ministry of Defense also released footage it said showed its strike teams hitting Ukrainian armed forces positions in the Krasnoye Liman district. The European Greens approved their manifesto in Lyon on Sunday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The document will serve as a common manifesto for all the continent's green groups for the European elections in June, but it is also the roadmap for the next five years in European Parliament. mais c'est aussi la voie pour les 5 prochaines années au Parlement européen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Elle priorise la renforcement du pacte vert et l l'ennemi de la justice sociale, nous démontrons qu'au contraire, non seulement ce n'est pas l'ennemi, mais c'est la seule solution crédible pour amener la justice sociale aujourd'hui et répondre à la crise du pouvoir d'achat qui est la préoccupation majeure des Européens aujourd'hui. for the Greens will be to defend democracy and the rule of law within the European Union.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: They also want solutions to geopolitical tensions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The Greens have been working on this manifesto for almost a year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Speaking to Euronews, the Greens insisted environmental policy should still be a top priority for Europe in spite of calls for a pause in the climate effort.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: What I hear from both movements, NGOs, from companies is actually let's have an ambitious green transition and if we do it together, if we really make the choice to do this, put it forward as a plan, private sector is along as well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: What I hear right now is the right wing saying let's put a break to the green deal, let's stop all the transition talk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: But that's not what I hear when I talk to neither civil society nor the private sector.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: They actually want a plan that takes us forward and not backwards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: This is the manifesto the newly elected heads of the Green List, Terry Reich and Baz Eichhout, will have to defend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The party is confident they can beat the polls which predict a difficult election for the Greens.

For the first 10 months, he could not contact his family. After several hunger strikes, he has now very limited phone calls. And in these almost two years, he only had two video calls. He is forced to do them in English.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: They call it the Bronx. But this is not the neighborhood of New York. It is on the outskirts of Naples, a working class neighborhood where, at the end of the 80s, two large public housing buildings were built hastily and badly following the terrible earthquake of 1980.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: After 40 years of waiting and 7 years of fighting for the construction of decent homes, today the inhabitants of the neighbourhood can finally celebrate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: The dilapidated buildings will be replaced by new, smaller buildings with green areas, urban gardens and sports fields.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But the demolition could lead to the possible perdita possibile delle murali di Iorit, un artista stradale conosciuto nel mondo che ha portato la bellezza e l'identità a un posto scordato per la maggior parte. Iorit ha dipinto la più grande murala di Maradona del mondo, che è qui a Naples.
